description:
The Sadist is self-named and enjoys inflicting pain. She would rather make you submit then go for points.
The Badger is back after her injury, and is ready to throw down again. She hopes her experience will over come the size difference and that she will be the one dealing out the pain.
The Sadist punished the poor Badger, getting her to submit 5 times. With fingers in her pussy most the match, The Badger never had a chance.
title: The Sadist(0-1) Ranked 8th
